video.title: The 100
video.synopsis: A century after Earth was devastated by a nuclear apocalypse, 100 space station residents are sent to the planet to determine whether it's habitable.

episodes.synopsis: One hundred young exiles from a dying space station are sent to Earth 97 years after a nuclear apocalypse to test if the planet is now inhabitable.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Having discovered that Jasper may still be alive, Clarke, Bellamy, Octavia, Finn and Monty set out on a mission to locate their friend.
episodes.title: Earth Skills

episodes.synopsis: Clarke, Bellamy, Octavia, Finn and Monty set out to locate Jasper, who may still be alive. Meanwhile, Abby is determined to get to Earth.
episodes.title: Earth Kills

episodes.synopsis: After a shocking death, Clarke and Finn grow closer. Bellamy must keep the group from turning on one another and Abby takes a huge risk.
episodes.title: Murphy's Law

episodes.synopsis: After exposing Kane’s plan to reduce the population of the Ark, Abby and Jaha realize at least some of the 100 must still be alive.
episodes.title: Twilight's Last Gleaming

episodes.synopsis: Bellamy and his crew run into Grounder territory as they search for Octavia while Raven notices the deep connection between Finn and Clarke.
episodes.title: His Sister's Keeper

episodes.synopsis: Abby guides Clarke through a dangerous procedure while Diana Sydney takes her place as Chancellor. Kane agonizes over his recent decision.
episodes.title: Contents Under Pressure

episodes.synopsis: Some of the 100 lose touch with reality after eating a hallucinogen. One of them is tasked to kill and Diane Sydney's treachery is revealed.
episodes.title: Day Trip

episodes.synopsis: Clarke and Finn attempt to broker peace with the Grounders while others prepare for battle. Meanwhile, tragedy strikes the Unity Day celebration.
episodes.title: Unity Day

episodes.synopsis: John Murphy returns claiming to have been held captive by the Grounders and Clarke and Bellamy have different ideas on how to handle his return.
episodes.title: I Am Become Death

episodes.synopsis: Clarke and Finn lead a hunt for food, Raven makes Bellamy an offer he can’t refuse, and Kane risks his life and reunites with Jaha and Abby.
episodes.title: The Calm

episodes.synopsis: Clarke and Finn are confronted by a new enemy, Bellamy makes a heroic move to save Jasper, while those on the Ark face the inevitable.
episodes.title: We Are Grounders: Part I

episodes.synopsis: As the conflict escalates, Clarke pleads with Bellamy to do the right thing. Octavia makes a difficult choice. Raven and Jasper work against time.
episodes.title: We Are Grounders: Part II

episodes.synopsis: Trapped in the white room, Clarke tries to make sense of her surroundings. The Ark survivors face moral and physical dilemmas. An old enemy returns.
episodes.title: The 48

episodes.synopsis: A suspicious Clarke confronts President Dante Wallace and demands answers. Kane interrogates one of the 100, and Abby performs emergency surgery.
episodes.title: Inclement Weather

episodes.synopsis: Clarke teams with an unlikely ally after making a horrific discovery about Mount Weather's medical ward. Abby confesses to a crime.
episodes.title: Reapercussions

episodes.synopsis: After a betrayal, Clarke takes matters into her own hands, Bellamy, Finn and Murphy race to save a stranger and tensions rise between Raven and Wick.
episodes.title: Many Happy Returns

episodes.synopsis: Kane leads a mission to make peace with the Grounders, Jasper participates in a risky experiment and President Dante Wallace issues a warning.
episodes.title: Human Trials

episodes.synopsis: Raven learns that Mount Weather is causing communication interference, tempers flare between Clarke and Finn, and traitors surround President Wallace.
episodes.title: Fog of War

episodes.synopsis: Abby prepares a leap of faith to save her people from a Grounder assault. Meanwhile, Bellamy and Octavia share a shocking secret with Clarke.
episodes.title: Long into an Abyss

episodes.synopsis: A riot breaks out over Finn's actions as Abby and others decide whether to put him on trial or turn him over to the grounders for torture.
episodes.title: Spacewalker

episodes.synopsis: Clarke strikes a deal with Lexa and Indra while the newly formed alliance between the Sky People and the Grounders is threatened.
episodes.title: Remember Me

episodes.synopsis: Clarke and Lexa encounter a new enemy, Bellamy and Lincoln work together to break into Mount Weather and Indra makes Octavia an appealing offer.
episodes.title: Survival of the Fittest

episodes.synopsis: Bellamy and Lincoln's actions have brutal consequences, Abby fights to stay in control and a desperate Jasper confronts President Wallace.
episodes.title: Coup de Grace

episodes.synopsis: Tensions between Clarke and Abby come to a head, Raven helps Bellamy navigate Mount Weather and Jaha and Murphy encounter a stranger.
episodes.title: Rubicon

episodes.synopsis: Clarke questions Lexa's leadership decisions, Abby struggles to help an injured Kane while Jasper steps into a leadership role.
episodes.title: Resurrection

episodes.synopsis: Desperate for help, Raven summons Wick, Jaha and Murphy encounter a perilous roadblock and Bellamy is in a race against time at Mount Weather.
episodes.title: Bodyguard of Lies

episodes.synopsis: Clarke and Lexa prepare for battle, while Raven and Wick experience a major setback. Meanwhile, Octavia and Lincoln must make a difficult decision.
episodes.title: Blood Must Have Blood: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The journey to the City of Light continues as Jaha makes a move that shocks Murphy, Clarke receives unexpected help and Lincoln gets his revenge.
episodes.title: Blood Must Have Blood: Part 2
